group_1.textRight: Found ya, Sana!

group_1.textLeft: Felicia-san... And Ui-chan and Tsuruno-san…!?

group_1.textRight: I’m so relieved.
You weren’t answering our calls or replying to our messages...
I was even wondering what we were going to do @if we couldn’t find you again.

group_1.textLeft: Again… What does that mean…?

group_1.textRight: Yer a repeat runaway, Sana.
This sort of thing happened before, with you @leaving home...

group_1.textLeft: H-Huhhh...!? That’s in the past, I wasn’t planning @on doing that...
And I’m not running away from home right now.
I was just returning home from seeing @Nemu-chan…!?

group_1.textRight: Eh, really?

group_1.textLeft: Yes…!

group_1.textRight: Sorry, Sana-san... We misunderstood.
I got a message from Nemu-chan
saying she was worried about how you were acting,
but you’d already left.
And then because you still weren’t back when you should have been,
we didn’t know what’d happened and rushed out @in a panic.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so that’s what happened.
Sorry, I made extra work for you all...

group_1.textRight: No, no, not at all! I’m so glad nothing happened.

group_1.textLeft: >Sana, is it really all right for you to stay? @>You don’t have to go home?
>Your friends and family must worry.

group_1.textRight: Thank you...
But, you know, I don’t mind even if they do worry.
I hate being at school and at home, so...
I actually have a much better time here...
And it’s not just that. I’m “[textRed:invisible]” to everyone...
No one would be able to find me, even if they tried.

group_1.textLeft: (Compared to then, I’m very fortunate to be @where I’m at now,)
(so there’s no reason for me to be all depressed @over just losing my dream…)

group_1.textRight: Ah, they’re here!

group_1.textLeft: Eh… You came too, Iroha-san, Yachiyo-san…!?

group_1.textRight: Sana-chan…! We found you almost immediately, @thank goodness.
You weren’t running away or anything, right…?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, it’s my fault for being the first to jump to the wrong conclusion.
Oh no… I’m sorry, this is all because of me...

group_1.textRight: It’s totally not a big deal, don’t worry about it.
...Though even if I say that, I’m sure Sana-chan will @still worry about it...
...Futaba-san, today you went to see Hiiragi-san by yourself, yes?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: ...Knowing that you were starting to work to @achieve your dream
made us, uh, how do I put this...

group_1.textLeft: We wanted to help you somehow, but also didn’t @know if doing nothing was better.
Basically, everyone was antsy.

group_1.textRight: Yes… So that’s why we overreacted to Hiiragi-san’s message.
Ah, that’s right.
Now that we’ve found Sana-san, I should give Nemu-chan a call.

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: Hey, Nemu-chan? We found Sana-san.
Oh, okay. I’ll hand the phone over.
Here you go, Sana-san.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, alright...
Hello...

group_1.textRight: My apologies, I’d like to continue our conversation @from earlier.
For the most part, authors directly meet with @editors to discuss.
However, there’s also a way which doesn’t require @that.
In Japan, it’s customary for the author and publisher @to communicate directly with each other,
but overseas, a system of agents exists.
It would be the agent, not the author, who’d correspond with the publisher.

group_1.textLeft: Then...

group_1.textRight: Mhm, it might be difficult without the right work @to show,
but I think publishing in Japan isn’t impossible.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you, Nemu-chan.
I really am a lost cause...
Even though I wanted to use my picture books @to tell others to not give up even if they were @currently suffering,
I myself gave up once I felt things were hopeless.

group_1.textRight: Unconventional paths all look impossible at first.
Still, paving the way will become a way to @help others.
People will try to live in the same manner that @pioneer did.

group_1.textLeft: Someone would… for my life...

group_1.textRight: Therefore, isn’t that why you wanted to create @picture books?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:100401:cheek_1][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]Yeah…
Since I want to help others, using my picture books @to share my experiences,
I won’t give up, and I’ll keep trying…!
